author: Abigail Gullo
description: A rye whiskey-based Boulevardier with both the generous measure of rye and its high alc./vol. making this a boozy but tasty aperitivo or digestivo.
name: Rye Boulevardier
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice)
